channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Mediamatic – Media Library Folders

item.title: CVE-2021-24848|2024-08-03T19:42:17.251Z -- unknown -- mediamatic%20%E2%80%93%20media%20library%20folders
item.description: The mediamaticAjaxRenameCategory AJAX action of the Mediamatic WordPress plugin before 2.8.1, available to any authenticated user, does not sanitise the categoryID parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to an SQL injection
